translations: 徐徐滴入；逐渐灌输（instill 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: His death taught me many lessons, but the one so harshly instilled in me is that no one, even someone as great as him, is invincible.
sentences.translation: 他的故事教给我了许多教训，但灌输给我如此残酷的一个是，任何人，甚至像他那样伟大的人，都不是不可战胜的。

sentences.sentence: In men, this trait is instilled environmentally.
sentences.translation: 在男性中，这一个性是受环境的缓慢转变影响。

sentences.sentence: This is what I want to see instilled in these children.
sentences.translation: 这就是我希望看到输灌给孩子的观念。
